text: tum mein se jo log apanee beeviyon ke saath zahaar karate hain apanee beevee ko maan kahate hain vah kuchh unakee maen nahin (ho jaateen) unakee maen to bas vahee hain jo unako janatee hain aur vah beshak ek naamaaqool aur jhoothee baat kahate hain aur khuda beshak maaph karane vaala aur bada bakhshane vaala hai
